casebody.data:
CLOVERDALE HOLDINGS, LLC, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Patricia WHITLOW, Defendant-Appellee,
and
Safeway Transportation, Inc., and Safeway Transportation 11, Ltd., Defendants. SC: 157332
COA: 335424 Supreme Court of Michigan. August 10, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion to extend the time for filing the defendant-appellee's answer is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before August 20, 2018.
